column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tina - Thanks for your review. We appreciate your constructive criticism and will take it under advisement
column2: though it's important to note that we only have 89 seats at JINYA-Midtown
column3: which includes the 9 seats at the liquor bar. And when our wait-list tops out at two hours
column5: we are forced to get somewhat creative to accommodate our guests. Sometimes the seating arrangements are not ideal
column6: but this is the finite space we have to work with. In the coming months
column7: we will be opening two more JINYA locations in Houston
column8: both of which will be significantly larger than our Midtown location. We hope that will alleviate some of the congestion.
